text:
September 19, 1957
Mrs. Ruth M. Funderburk
Serials librarian
The Library
Los Angeles State College
855 North Vermont Avenue
Los Angeles 29, California
Dear Mrs. Funderburk:
Thank you for your letter of September 16.
Our Fact Sheets are available for $2.50 per year. They are published at
irregular intervals and if you subscribe now, you will receive ail those
which have been issued since January of this year* Your subscription
will then run until January 1958.
You may also purchase back issues from 1955 and 1956. These also
are priced at $2.50 per year.
If you wish more information regarding our Fact Sheets, please let me know.
For your convenience and interest A am enclosing a listing of our publica¬
tions and recordings •
May we hear from you regarding our Fact Sheets ?
Sincerely,
Enclosure
(Mrs.) Judith B. Gans
Secretary
